sections.title: B.F.PEL
sections.content: During August 12-1L ASIS. All aspects relating to the successful transition of products from R&D to manufacturing were discussed with RR3. There are two primary concerns: 1. There is a lack of adherence to our product standards, not satisfactory. Sources of variability include raw materials, the product, the process, and the method for measuring quality. A transfer of information is necessary.

sections.title: Comments
sections.content: Derived from the discussions and information provided, unforeseen issues are arising: 1. Product transition 2. Process integrity/product harshness 3. Process description
